I'm sorry you had to deal with stupid security officers and store owners... ; however, maybe that Asian salon owner wasn't being racist but rather did not have the education to cut coarser hair and was knowledgeable enough to know where her skills lacked ability. I've had terrible haircuts because the stylist didn't have the knowledge to cut my funky asian hair and didn't inform me of that. Unfortunately not all salon schools or hair stylists learn to cut all types of hair. If she was being racist I'm sorry. Personally i wouldn't want to support her business because either she's racist or needs more training.

Travis, that shows about how much research you have done. Please, explain the dozens of old newspaper records reporting 7, 8, 10, and 12 foot skeletons being found by mimers, farmers turning up their land, railroad workers clearing land, and construction crews digging new foundations? Or the MANY skulls that can be found in south America that range from 2-4x the size of the average human skull? Don't be fooled by the things the scientific community hides and shove under the rug in an attempt to protect their own theories and truths.

i guess you've never heard of the US black budget? i mean you're talking about two different animals here. Russia had just as many issues in Afghanistan as we did. guerilla warfare is always a threat to a large bulky military, that's how the Americans won the Revolutionary War for the most part. we had the same problems in Vietnam and in Iraq and Afghanistan. but wars between two """"equally"""" matched large nations are not even comparable. you're oversimplifying far too much. to win, they would have to invade us, not just repel an invasion. we DO have functional stealth, I'm surprised you dont realize that. we invented stealth almost forty years ago. China hasnt come close to matching our technology from 20 years ago. same with Russia. China has one advantage, a large army. Russia has one advantage, a more robust cyberwarfare department. in every other category, we are superior.
